name: rtm_transform
description: Small utilities to convert RememberTheMilk JSON exports into Todoist CSV imports

scripts.test: node ./scripts/ensure_sample_export.js && npm run test:csv && npm run test:ical && npm run test:note-prefix && node ./scripts/test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run extract && npm run transform && npm run test:csv && npm run test:ical && npm run test:ordering && npm run test:no-orphans && npm run test:trashed
